alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Kings and Nassau Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rockaway Beach, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Levittown, Freeport, Valley Stream, Long Beach, Glen Cove, Garden City, Massapequa, Lynbrook, Mineola, Woodmere, Westbury, Rockaway Beach, Great Neck and Farmingdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
